--------

.. currentmodule:: caps.quality_control.snapshots

Inputs
~~~~~~


[Mandatory]

+---------------------------------------------+
| | **input_image**: a file name (mandatory)  |
| |     An image to snap                      |
+---------------------------------------------+

[Optional]

+----------------------------------------------------------+
| | **edges_image**: a file name (optional)                |
| |     An image with edges superposed to the input image  |
+----------------------------------------------------------+
